page.title: 10SKELMORLIE VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: There are many village events in the form of coffee mornings,afternoon teas jumble sales,whist drives,beetle drives all organised to raise funds for clubs but the biggest event is { GALA DAY} Before Gala Day a "Queen" has been chosen with her attendants and they help open the Gala which lasts all day In the morning there is an Art and Craft show,a Bonny Baby Competition and a coffee morning.In the afternoon on the playing field there are games, competitions,pipe bands,dancing,fancy dress parades,knock out football.In- side the Community Centre the Art Show contiues plus there is a tearoom.Gala Day finishes off with a dance in the evening. Funds raised run the Community Mini Bus which is for the use of all the clubs and old people in the area.
